diff_act: 1.Halt the opening or closing sequence if the system detects any anomaly.
2.change status of closure device to unknown
3.change status of closure device to closed
4.change status of closure device to open

regen.absent_element: situation of halting when status changes to open without operator's command
regen.new_specification: The system shall halt the current sequence if the status of a closure device, previously closed at the current entrance, changes to open without an operator-initiated command.

regen.absent_element: status change to open without operator command after closure
regen.new_specification: If the status of a closure device, which was previously closed at the current entrance, changes to open without an operator-initiated command, the sequence shall be halted.

regen.absent_element: handling of closure device status changing to 'open'
regen.new_specification: The sequence shall be halted if the status of a closure device changes to open without an operator-initiated command after being previously closed.

label: The status of a closure device, which was previously closed at the current entrance, changes to unknown or open, without an operator-initiated command.
